metadata.title: CVE-2015-1419 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in vsftpd 3.0.2 and earlier allows remoteattackers to bypass access restrictions via unknown vectors, related todeny_file parsing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vsftpd - 3.0.2-18ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vsftpd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-18ubuntu1').
